bundle.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] or [accent]global[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]If you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP, which can be found by googling "my ip" from their device.
bundle.properties.servers.disclaimer: Community servers are [accent]not[] owned or controlled by the developer.\n\nServers may contain user-generated content that is not appropriate for all ages.

bundle.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Mace units. Destroy it.
bundle.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
The origin of spores. This is the facility in which they were researched and initially produced.
Research the technology contained within. Cultivate spores for the production of fuel and plastics.

[lightgray]Upon this facility's demise, the spores were released. Nothing in the local ecosystem could compete with such an invasive organism.
bundle.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Further past the shoreline is this remote chain of islands. Records show they once had [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.\n\nFend off the enemy's naval units. Establish a base on the islands. Research these factories.
bundle.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: A remote outpost, constructed by the enemy for the purpose of launching resources to other sectors.\n\nCross-sector transport technology is essential for further conquest. Destroy the base. Research their Launch Pads.
bundle.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Here lie remnants of the interstellar transport vessel that first entered this system.\n\nSalvage as much as possible from the wreckage. Research any intact technology.
bundle.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
The final target.

This coastal base contains a structure capable of launching Cores to local planets. It is extremely well guarded.

Produce naval units. Eliminate the enemy as quickly as possible. Research the launch structure.

bundle.properties.hint.mine: Move near the \uf8c4 copper ore and [accent]tap[] it to mine manually.
bundle.properties.hint.depositItems: To transfer items, drag from your ship to the core.
bundle.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control to a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a  [accent]Conveyor[] from the  [accent]Distribution[] tab.

Click and drag to place multiple conveyors.
[accent]Scroll[] to rotate.
bundle.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] from the \ue814 [accent]Distribution[] tab.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to place multiple conveyors.
bundle.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Place  [accent]Turrets[] to defend your base from enemies.

Turrets require ammo - in this case, copper.
Use conveyors and drills to supply them.
bundle.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: Activate the \ue817 [accent]hammer[] in the bottom right and tap to break blocks.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to break in a selection.
bundle.properties.hint.research: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button to research new technology.
bundle.properties.hint.research.mobile: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[] to research new technology.
bundle.properties.hint.unitControl: Hold [accent][[L-ctrl][] and [accent]click[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle.properties.hint.launch: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the bottom right.
bundle.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Hold [accent][[F][] and drag to select blocks to copy and paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] to copy a single block type.
bundle.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Enable \ue844 [accent]diagonal mode[] and drag conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle.properties.hint.boost: Hold [accent][[L-Shift][] to fly over obstacles with your current unit.\n\nOnly a few ground units have boosters.
bundle.properties.hint.command: Press [accent][[G][] to command nearby units of [accent]similar type[] into formation.\n\nTo command ground units, you must first control another ground unit.
bundle.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] your unit to command nearby units into formation.
bundle.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Press [accent][[[] to pick up small blocks or units.
bundle.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] a small block or unit to pick it up.
bundle.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a ï¡¨ [accent]Foundation[] core over the ï¡© [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle.properties.item.copper.description: Used in all types of construction and ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.copper.details: Copper. Abnormally abundant metal on Serpulo. Structurally weak unless reinforced.
bundle.properties.item.lead.description: Used in liquid transportation and electrical structures.
bundle.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle.properties.item.graphite.description: Used in electrical components and turret ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.sand.description: Used for production of other refined materials.
bundle.properties.item.coal.description: Used for fuel and refined material production.
bundle.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle.properties.item.titanium.description: Used in liquid transportation structures, drills and aircraft.
bundle.properties.item.thorium.description: Used in durable structures and as nuclear fuel.
bundle.properties.item.scrap.description: Used in Melters and Pulverizers for refining into other materials.
bundle.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle.properties.item.silicon.description: Used in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.plastanium.description: Used in advanced units, insulation and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Used in advanced electronics and self-repairing structures.
bundle.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Used in advanced weaponry and reactive defense structures.
bundle.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spores. Likely a synthetic life form. Emit gases toxic to other biological life. Extremely invasive. Highly flammable in certain conditions.
bundle.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Used in bombs and explosive ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.pyratite.description: Used in incendiary weapons and combustion-fueled generators.
bundle.properties.liquid.water.description: Used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle.properties.liquid.slag.description: Refined in separators into constituent metals, or sprayed at enemies as a weapon.
bundle.properties.liquid.oil.description: Used in advanced material production and as incendiary ammunition.
bundle.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Used as coolant in reactors, turrets and factories.
bundle.properties.block.resupply-point.description: Resupplies nearby units with copper ammunition. Not compatible with units that require battery power.
bundle.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Moves items forward. Does not accept inputs from the sides.
bundle.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message for communication between allies.
bundle.properties.block.multi-press.description: Compresses coal into graphite. Requires water as coolant.
bundle.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal.
bundle.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from thorium and sand.
bundle.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Fuses titanium, lead, silicon and copper into surge alloy.
bundle.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder to produce cryofluid.
bundle.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Produces blast compound from pyratite and spore pods.
bundle.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into pyratite.
bundle.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components.
bundle.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any item or liquid it receives.
bundle.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted. Sandbox only.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles. Absorbs lasers and electric arcs. Blocks automatic power connections.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles. Absorbs lasers and electric arcs. Blocks automatic power connections.
bundle.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles, reflecting most bullets upon impact.
bundle.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles, reflecting most bullets upon impact.
bundle.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles, periodically releasing electric arcs upon contact.
bundle.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Protects structures from enemy projectiles, periodically releasing electric arcs upon contact.
bundle.properties.block.door.description: A wall that can be opened and closed.
bundle.properties.block.door-large.description: A wall that can be opened and closed.
bundle.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric increases shield size.
bundle.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Releases electric arcs upon enemy unit contact.
bundle.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Transports items forward. Faster than a standard conveyor.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Transports items forward in batches. Accepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front. Requires multiple loading and unloading points for peak throughput.
bundle.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts.
bundle.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Transports items over terrain or buildings.
bundle.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Instantly transports items over terrain or buildings. Longer range than the item bridge, but requires power.
bundle.properties.block.sorter.description: If an input item matches the selection, it passes forward. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Similar to a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle.properties.block.router.description: Distributes input items to 3 output directions equally.
bundle.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle.properties.block.distributor.description: Distributes input items to 7 output directions equally.
bundle.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Only outputs items to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: Opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Long-range item transport structure. Collects batches of items and shoots them to other mass drivers.
bundle.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Pumps and outputs liquids. Does not require power.
bundle.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Pumps and outputs liquids. Requires power.
bundle.properties.block.conduit.description: Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Moves liquids forward. Transports faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids forward. Does not accept input from the sides. Does not leak.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquid. Outputs to all sides, similarly to a liquid router.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits.
bundle.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Transports liquids over terrain or buildings.
bundle.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Transports liquids over terrain or buildings. Longer range than the bridge conduit, but requires power.
bundle.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle.properties.block.surge-tower.description: A long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle.properties.block.diode.description: Moves battery power in one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores power in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit. Higher capacity than a regular battery.
bundle.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle.properties.block.steam-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials and converting water to steam.
bundle.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun. More efficient than the standard solar panel.
bundle.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Creates massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: When placed on ore, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of atmospheric spores into spore pods.
bundle.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle.properties.block.core-shard.description: Core of the base. Once destroyed, the sector is lost.
bundle.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle.properties.block.core-foundation.description: Core of the base. Well armored. Stores more resources than a Shard.
bundle.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: Core of the base. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Contents can be retrieved with an unloader.
bundle.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Contents can be retrieved with an unloader.
bundle.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads the selected item from nearby blocks.
bundle.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items to selected sectors.
bundle.properties.block.scatter.description: Fires clumps of lead, scrap or metaglass flak at enemy aircraft.
bundle.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle.properties.block.hail.description: Fires small shells at ground enemies over long distances.
bundle.properties.block.wave.description: Fires streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle.properties.block.lancer.description: Charges and fires powerful beams of energy at ground targets.
bundle.properties.block.arc.description: Fires arcs of electricity at ground targets.
bundle.properties.block.salvo.description: Fires quick salvos of bullets at enemies.
bundle.properties.block.fuse.description: Fires three close-range piercing blasts at nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.block.ripple.description: Shoots clusters of shells at ground enemies over long distances.
bundle.properties.block.cyclone.description: Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.block.spectre.description: Fires large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle.properties.block.meltdown.description: Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Fires a large single-target bolt over long distances.
bundle.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously repairs the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.
bundle.properties.block.parallax.description: Fires a tractor beam that pulls in air targets, damaging them in the process.
bundle.properties.block.tsunami.description: Fires powerful streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal, using pyratite as an additional heat source. More efficient in hot locations.
bundle.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separates slag into trace amounts of exotic mineral components at low efficiency. Can produce thorium.
bundle.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings. Requires phase fabric and silicon to operate.
bundle.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Moves large payloads, such as units from factories.
bundle.properties.block.payload-router.description: Splits input payloads into 3 output directions.
bundle.properties.block.command-center.description: Controls unit behavior with several different commands.
bundle.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produces ground units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produces air units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produces naval units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Upgrades inputted units to the second tier.
bundle.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Upgrades inputted units to the third tier.
bundle.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Upgrades inputted units to the fourth tier.
bundle.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Upgrades inputted units to the fifth and final tier.
bundle.properties.block.switch.description: A toggleable switch. State can be read and controlled with logic processors.
bundle.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings.
bundle.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the micro processor.
bundle.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the logic processor.
bundle.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Stores information for a logic processor.
bundle.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Stores information for a logic processor. High capacity.
bundle.properties.block.logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: A massive electromagnetic railgun tower. Accelerates cores to escape velocity for interplanetary deployment.
bundle.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.

bundle_be.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_be.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_be.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_be.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_be.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_be.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_be.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_be.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_be.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_be.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_be.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_da.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_da.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_da.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_da.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_da.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_da.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_da.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_da.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_da.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_da.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_da.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_da.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Use[accent] [[WASD][] to move.
[accent]Scroll[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
You can also select the drill by tapping [accent][[2][] then [accent][[1][] quickly, regardless of which tab is open.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.
Use the scrollwheel to rotate blocks before placing them.
[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo[] to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_da.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These obtained resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_da.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_da.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_da.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_da.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical components.
bundle_da.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_da.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_da.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_da.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_da.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_da.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_da.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_da.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_da.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_da.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_da.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_da.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_da.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_da.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_da.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_da.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_da.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_da.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_da.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_da.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_da.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_da.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_da.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_da.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_da.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_da.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_da.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_da.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_da.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_da.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_da.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_da.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_da.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_da.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_da.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_da.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_da.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_da.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_da.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_da.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_da.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_da.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_da.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_da.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_da.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_da.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_da.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_da.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_da.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_da.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_da.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_da.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_da.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_da.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_da.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_da.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_da.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_da.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_da.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_da.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_da.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_da.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_da.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_da.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_da.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_da.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_da.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_da.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle_da.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_da.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_da.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_da.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_da.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_da.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_da.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_da.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_da.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_da.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_da.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_da.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_da.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_da.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_da.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_da.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_da.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_da.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_da.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_da.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_da.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_da.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_da.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_da.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_da.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_da.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from any nearby non-transportation block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_da.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_da.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_da.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_da.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_da.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_da.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_da.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_da.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_da.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_da.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_da.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_da.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_da.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_da.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.

bundle_de.properties.sector.groundZero.description: Der optimale Ort, um anzufangen. Schwache Gegner und weniger Ressourcen.\nSammele so viel Kupfer und Blei wie mÃ¶glich.\nGeh weiter.
bundle_de.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Auch hier, nÃ¤her an den Bergen, sind die Sporen. Sogar die niedrigen Temperaturen kÃ¶nnen sie nicht zurÃ¼ckhalten.\n\nLerne, Strom zu verwenden. Baue Verbrennungsgeneratoren und Reparateure.
bundle_de.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: Du befindest dich in der NÃ¤he der WÃ¼ste. Hier gibt es nur wenige Ressourcen.\n\nDer Gegner hat hier ein Lager aufgestellt. ZerstÃ¶re es. Lasse nichts stehen.
bundle_de.properties.sector.craters.description: Wasser hat sich hier, in diesem Ãberbleibsel aus dem alten Krieg, versammelt. Sammele Sand. Stelle Metaglas her. Benutze Wasser, um Bohrer und GeschÃ¼tze zu kÃ¼hlen.
bundle_de.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Hinter der WÃ¼ste ist das Ufer. Es gab hier vor langer Zeit ein Uferabwehrsystem. Heute sind nur noch die einfachsten AbwehrgeschÃ¼tze vorhanden, der Rest wurde verschrottet.\nBreite dich weiter aus. Finde die verlorenen Technologien wieder.
bundle_de.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Im Landesinneren sind die Berge, noch unversehrt von den Sporen.
Nutze das reichliche vorhandene Titan und lerne, es zu benutzen.

Die Gegner hier sind stÃ¤rker. Gib ihnen keine Zeit, um ihre stÃ¤rksten Einheiten zu schicken.
bundle_de.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: Dieser Bereich ist Ã¼berwuchert, nÃ¤her an die Quelle der Sporen.\nDer Gegner hat hier einen AuÃenposten errichtet. Baue Mace-Einheiten. ZerstÃ¶re ihn.
bundle_de.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
Der Rand einer Ãlproduktionszone, zwischen den Bergen und der WÃ¼ste. Einer der wenigen Orte mit brauchbaren Ãlquellen.
Obwohl er vergessen wurde, hat dieser Ort mÃ¤chtige gegnerische Lager in der NÃ¤he. UnterschÃ¤tze sie nicht.

[lightgray]Erforsche, falls mÃ¶glich, die Ãlverarbeitung.
bundle_de.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: Eine besonders gefÃ¤hrliche Zone. Viele Ressourcen aber wenig Platz. Hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, vernichtet zu werden. Verlasse diesen Ort so bald wie mÃ¶glich. Lass dich nicht durch die langen AbstÃ¤nde zwischen gegnerischen Angriffen tÃ¤uschen.
bundle_de.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
Diese Ruine war vor langer Zeit eine Anlage zur Verarbeitung von Thorium.
[lightgray]Erforsche Thorium und dessen Anwendungen.

Der Gegner ist hier stark vertreten und hÃ¤lt nach Angreifern Ausschau.
bundle_de.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: Eine Ãbergangszone zwischen den Bergen und den niedrigeren, von Sporen befallenen Gebieten. Hier ist eine kleine gegnerische Basis.\nZerstÃ¶re sie.\nBenutze Dagger- und Crawler-Einheiten. Vernichte die beiden Kerne.
bundle_de.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
Die Sporenquelle. Dies ist der Ort, wo sie erforscht und hergestellt wurden.
Erforsche die Technologie, die sich hier versteckt. Stellen Sporen her, um Plastanium und Ãl herzustellen.

[lightgray]Als diese Anlage zerstÃ¶rt wurde, wurden die Sporen freigesetzt. Nichts im lokalen Ãkosystem konnte so ein eindringliches Lebewesen bekÃ¤mpfen.
bundle_de.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Diese Inseln befinden sich in der NÃ¤he vom Ufer. Manche Aufzeichnungen behaupten, hier seien Fabriken, die [accent]Plastanium[] herstellen kÃ¶nnen.\n\nWehre dich gegen die gegnerischen Wassereinheiten. Stelle eine Basis auf den Inseln auf. Erforsche diese Fabriken.
bundle_de.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: Ein AuÃenposten, der vom Gegner erstellt wurde, um Ressourcen in andere Sektoren zu transportieren.\n\nTrans-Sektorischer Transport ist nÃ¶tig, um weiter voranzuschreiten. ZerstÃ¶re den Posten. Erforsche deren Launchpads.
bundle_de.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Hier liegen Reste der interplanetarischen Transporteinheit, die dieses Sonnensystem zuerst betreten hat.\n\nRette so viel wie mÃ¶glich von den Ruinen. Erforsche jede intakte Technologie.
bundle_de.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
Das Endziel.

Diese Uferbasis besitzt ein GerÃ¤t, mit dem es mÃ¶glich ist, Kerne auf andere Planeten zu schicken. Es ist [accent]sehr[] gut beschÃ¼tzt.

Stelle Wassereinheiten her. Eliminiere den Gegner so schnell wie mÃ¶glich. Erforsche das LaunchgerÃ¤t.

bundle_es.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: En las afueras del desierto se encuentran las Salinas. No hay muchos recursos en esta ubicaciÃ³n.\n\nEl enemigo ha creado un complejo de almacenamiento de recursos aquÃ­. Erradica su nÃºcleo. No dejes nada en pie.
bundle_es.properties.sector.craters.description: El agua se ha acumulado en este crÃ¡ter, reliquia de las viejas guerras. Recupera la zona. Recoge arena. Funde Metacristal. Bombea agua para enfriar torretas y taladros.
bundle_es.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: MÃ¡s allÃ¡ de los pÃ¡ramos, se encuentra la costa. Una vez, esta ubicaciÃ³n albergÃ³ una serie de defensa costera. No queda mucho. Solo las estructuras de defensa mÃ¡s bÃ¡sicas han quedado ilesas, todo lo demÃ¡s estÃ¡ reducido a chatarra.\nContinÃºa la expansiÃ³n. Redescubre la tecnologÃ­a.
bundle_es.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
MÃ¡s adentro se encuentran las montaÃ±as, aÃºn intactas por las esporas.
Extrae el abundante titanio de esta zona. Aprende a usarlo.

La presencia enemiga es mayor aquÃ­. No les des tiempo para enviar sus unidades mÃ¡s fuertes.
bundle_es.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: El Ã¡rea estÃ¡ cubierta de maleza, mÃ¡s cerca de la fuente de las esporas.\nEl enemigo ha establecido un puesto de avanzada aquÃ­. Construye unidades Mace. Destruyelo. Recupera lo que se perdiÃ³.
bundle_es.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
Las afueras de una zona de producciÃ³n de petrÃ³leo, entre la montaÃ±a y el desierto. Una de las pocas Ã¡reas con reservas de alquitrÃ¡n utilizables.
Aunque estÃ¡ abandonada, esta zona tiene algunas fuerzas enemigas peligrosas cerca. No los subestimes.

[lightgray]Investiga la tecnologÃ­a de procesamiento de petrÃ³leo si es posible.
bundle_es.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: Una zona extremadamente peligrosa. Recursos abundantes, pero poco espacio. Alto riesgo de destrucciÃ³n. Abandona el lugar lo antes posible. No te dejes engaÃ±ar por el intervalo entre los ataques enemigos.
bundle_es.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
Antigua instalaciÃ³n de producciÃ³n y procesamiento de torio, reducida a ruinas.
[lightgray] Investiga el torio y sus mÃºltiples usos.

El enemigo estÃ¡ presente aquÃ­,superando en nÃºmero a sus atacantes.
bundle_es.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: Un Ã¡rea de transiciÃ³n entre montaÃ±as y las tierras bajas, plagadas de esporas. AquÃ­ se encuentra una pequeÃ±a base de reconocimiento enemiga.\nDestrÃºyela.\nUsa unidades Dagger y Crawler. Acaba con los dos nÃºcleos.
bundle_es.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
El origen de las esporas. Este es el centro en el que se investigaron, y donde fueron incialmente producidas.
Descubre la tecnologÃ­a restante que contiene. Cultiva esporas para producir combustible y plÃ¡sticos.

[lightgray]Nada en el ecosistema local pudo combatir semejante organismo tan invasivo, originado en este lugar.
bundle_es.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Tras la costa, se encuentra esta remota cadena de islas. Las grabaciones muestran que aquÃ­ existieron estructuras relacionadas con la producciÃ³n de [accent]Plastanio[].\n\nDefiÃ©ndete de las unidades navales enemigas. Establece una base en las islas. Investiga estas fÃ¡bricas.
bundle_es.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: Una base remota, construida por el enemigo con el objetivo de lanzar recursos a otros sectores.\n\nLa tecnologÃ­a de transporte de recursos entre sectores es esencial para conquistar a gran escala. Destruye la base. Investiga sus Plataformas de Lanzamiento.
bundle_es.properties.sector.impact0078.description: AquÃ­ yacen las ruinas de la primera estaciÃ³n de transporte interestelar en estar operativa del sistema.\n\nRecupera todo lo posible de los escombros. Investiga cualquier tecnologÃ­a intacta.
bundle_es.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
El objetivo final.

Ãsta base costera alberga una estructura capaz de lanzar NÃºcleos a planeteas locales. EstÃ¡ extremadamente bien protegida.

Produce unidades navales. Acaba con el enemigo lo antes posible. Analiza la estructura de lanzamiento.

bundle_et.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_et.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_et.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_et.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_et.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_et.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_et.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_et.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_et.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_et.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_et.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_eu.properties.host.info:
[accent]Ostalaria[] botoiak zerbitzari bat abiatzen du [scarlet]6567[] atakan.
[lightgray]wifi edo sare lokal[] berean dagoen edonor zure zerbitzaria ikusi ahal beharko luke.

Jendea edonondik IP-a erabilita konektatu ahal izatea nahi baduzu, [accent]ataka birbidaltzea[] ezinbestekoa da.

[lightgray]Oharra: Inork zure sare lokalean partidara elkartzeko arazoak baditu, egiaztatu Mindustry-k baimena duela sare lokalera elkartzeko suebakiaren ezarpenetan. Kontuan izan sare publiko batzuk ez dutela zerbitzarien bilaketa baimentzen.
bundle_eu.properties.join.info:
Hemen, konektatzeko [accent]zerbitzari baten IP-a[] sartu dezakezu konektatzeko, edo [accent]sare lokaleko[] zerbitzariak bilatu.
LAN zein WAN sareetan onartzen dira hainbat jokalarien partidak .

[lightgray]Oharra: Ez dago zerbitzarien zerrenda global automatikorik, beste inorekin IP bidez konektatu nahi baduzu, ostalariari bere IP helbidea eskatu beharko diozu.

bundle_eu.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_eu.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Ziur datu hauek garbitu nahi dituzula?\nEgindakoa ezin da desegin!
bundle_eu.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]ABISUA![]\nHonek datu guztiak garbituko ditu, gordetako partidak, mapak, desblokeatutakoak, eta teklen konfigurazioak barne.\nBehin 'Ados' sakatzen duzula jolasak datuk guztiak ezabatuko ditu eta automatikoki irten.
