bundle_it.properties.hint.guardian: UnitÃ  [accent]Guardiano[] sono corazzate. Munizioni deboli come [accent]Rame[] e [accent]Piombo[] sono [scarlet]inefficaci[].\n\nUsa torrette di grado superiore o \uf835 [accent]Grafite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Cannone Leggero per buttare giÃ¹ il boss.
bundle_it.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: I nuclei possono essere aggiornati [accent]piazzando nuclei di un livello superiore sopra di loro[].\n\nPiazzia un nucleo ï¡¨ [accent]Fondazione[] sopra il nucleo ï¡© [accent]Frammento[]. Assicurati che sia libero da ostacoli.
bundle_it.properties.hint.presetLaunch: [accent]Settori grigi d'atterraggio[], come [accent]Foresta Ghiacciata[], possono essere lanciati da ovunque. Non richiedono la cattura nei terrotori circostanti.\n\n[accent]Settori numerati[], come questo qui, sono [accent]opzionali[].
bundle_it.properties.item.copper.description: Usato in molti tipi di costruzioni e munizioni.
bundle_it.properties.item.copper.details: Rame. Metallo anormalmente abbondante su Serpulo. Strutturalmente debole se non rinforzato.
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.description: Usato nel trasporto di liquidi e strutture elettriche.
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.details: Denso. Inerte. Ampiamente utilizzato in batterie.\nNota: Probabilmente tossico per le forme di vita biologica. Non che siano rimaste in molti qui.
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.description: Usato nelle strutture per il trasporto/immagazzinamento dei liquidi.
bundle_it.properties.item.graphite.description: Usato nei componenti elettrici e come munizione per le torrette.
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.description: Usata per la produzione di altri materiali raffinati.
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.description: Usato per la produzione di combustibili e materiali piÃ¹ raffinati.
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.details: Sembra siano resti organici fossilizzati di piante, formato prima dell'evento di semina.
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.description: Usato nelle strutture per il trasporto dei liquidi e per le trivelle.
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.description: Utilizzato per la costruzione delle strutture piÃ¹ robuste e come combustibile nucleare.
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.description: Utilizzato nel fonditore e nel polverizzatore per essere raffinato in altri materiali.
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.details: Detriti di vecchie strutture e unitÃ  abbandonate.
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.description: Usato nei pannelli solari, circuiti complessi e come munizione per certe torrette.
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.description: Utilizzato per le unitÃ  avanzate e come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Usato nei circuiti avanzati e per le strutture autoriparanti.
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Usato come munizione per torrette avanzate.
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Utilizzato per la conversione in petrolio, esplosivi e carburante.
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spore. Probabilmente una forma di vita sintetica. Emettono gas tossici alle vita biologica. Estremamente invasive. Altamente infiammabili in certe condizioni.
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un composto altamente volatile, utilizzato nella produzione di bombe ed esplosivi. PuÃ² essere utilizzato come combustibile anche se non Ã¨ consigliabile.
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.description: Una sostanza molto infiammabile che viene utilizzata nelle armi da fuoco.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.description: Usato per il raffreddamento di macchinari ed il trattamento dei rifiuti.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.slag.description: Raffinata nei separatori in diversi metalli o spruzzata sui nemici come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.description: Usato nella produzione di materiali avanzati e come munizione incendiaria.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Usato come refrigerante in reattori, torrette e macchinari.
bundle_it.properties.block.resupply-point.description: Rifornisce untiÃ  vicine con munizioni in rame. Incompatibile con unitÃ  che richiedono energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti. Non accetta oggetti dai lati.
bundle_it.properties.block.message.description: Memorizza un messaggio per le comunicazioni tra alleati.
bundle_it.properties.block.multi-press.description: Comprime il carbone in grafite. Necessite di acqua come refrigerante.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Raffina il silicio da sabbia e carbone.
bundle_it.properties.block.kiln.description: Fonde sabbia e piombo in vetro metallico.

bundle_it.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Sintetizza il tessuto di fase da torio e sabbia.
bundle_it.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Fonde titanio, piombo, silicio e rame nella lega di sovratensione.
bundle_it.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Miscela acqua e polvere di titanio per produrre il criofluido.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Produce composto esplosivo dalla pirite e dal baccello di spore.
bundle_it.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Miscela carbone, piombo e sabbia in pirite.
bundle_it.properties.block.separator.description: Raffina le scorie nei minerali che le compongono.
bundle_it.properties.block.spore-press.description: Comprime i baccelli di spore in petrolio.
bundle_it.properties.block.incinerator.description: Distrugge ogni oggetto o liquido che riceve.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-void.description: Distrugge l'energia in entrata. Disponibile solo nella modalitÃ  creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-source.description: Genera energia infinita. Disponibile solo nella modalitÃ  creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.item-source.description: Genera oggetti infiniti. Disponibile solo nella modalitÃ  creativa.

bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici.

bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici. Assorbe i raggi laser e gli archi elettrici. Absorbs lasers and electric arcs. Blocca le connessioni automatiche dei nodi energetici.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici. Assorbe i raggi laser e gli archi elettrici. Absorbs lasers and electric arcs. Blocca le connessioni automatiche dei nodi energetici.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici riflettendone la maggior parte all'impatto.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici riflettendone la maggior parte all'impatto.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici rilasciando periodicamente archi elettrici al contatto.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Protegge le strutture dai proiettili nemici rilasciando periodicamente archi elettrici al contatto.
bundle_it.properties.block.door.description: Un muro che puÃ² essere aperto o chiuso.
bundle_it.properties.block.door-large.description: Un muro che puÃ² essere aperto o chiuso.
bundle_it.properties.block.mender.description: Ripara periodicamente i blocchi nelle sue vicinanze.\nAccetta silicio per aumentare la portata e l'efficienza.
bundle_it.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Ripara periodicamente i blocchi nelle sue vicinanze.\nAccetta tessuto di fase per aumentare la portata e l'efficienza.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Aumenta la velocitÃ  delle strutture vicine.\nAccetta tessuto di fase per aumentare la portata e l'efficienza.
bundle_it.properties.block.force-projector.description: Crea un campo di forza esagonale attorno a se proteggendo le strutture e le unitÃ  dai proiettili nemici.\nSi surriscalda se subisce troppi colpi. Accetta liquidi refrigeranti per prevenire il surriscaldamento. Il tessuto di fase aumenta la portata dello scudo.
bundle_it.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Rilascia archi elettrici al contatto con un nemico.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti. Ã piÃ¹ veloce di un nastro trasportatore standard.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti in lotti. Accetta gli oggetti dal retro e li scarica in tre direzioni. Necessita di molteplici punti di carico e scarico per aumentare la portata.
bundle_it.properties.block.junction.description: Funge da ponte tra due nastri trasportatori che si incrociano.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti sopra blocchi e strutture.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti sopra blocchi e strutture istantaneamente. Ha un raggio piÃ¹ ampio rispetto al nastro trasportatore sopraelevato, ma ha bisogno di energia per funzionare.
bundle_it.properties.block.sorter.description: Se un oggetto in  ingresso corrisponde al filtro selezionato, passa avanti. Altrimenti l'oggetto viene deviato a destra e sinistra.
bundle_it.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Simile al filtro comune ma devia a destra e sinistra gli oggetti se corrispondono al filtro selezionato.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.description: Distribuisce equamente gli oggetti in entrata nelle 3 uscite.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.details: Un male necessario. L'uso dei distributori accanto agli input di produzione non Ã¨ consigliato poichÃ© verrebbero intasati dall'output.
bundle_it.properties.block.distributor.description: Distribuisce equamente gli oggetti in entrata nelle 7 uscite.
bundle_it.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Devia gli oggetti a destra e a sinistra solo se l'uscita anteriore Ã¨ bloccata. Non puÃ² essere usato insieme ad altri blocchi per la gestione degli oggetti.
bundle_it.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: L'esatto opposto del separatore per eccesso. Devia gli oggetti verso l'uscita anteriore solo se le uscite laterali sono bloccate. Non puÃ² essere usato insieme ad altri blocchi per la gestione degli oggetti.
bundle_it.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Struttura per il trasporto di oggetti a lungo raggio. Immagazzina lotti di oggetti e li spara ad un altro trasportatore di massa.
bundle_it.properties.block.conduit.description: Trasporta i liquidi. Spesso usato insieme a pompe e altri condotti.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Trasporta i liquidi piÃ¹ velocemente. Ha una capacitÃ  maggiore rispetto ai condotti tradizionali.
bundle_it.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Trasporta i liquidi. Non accetta liquidi dai lati. Non spande.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accetta liquidi da un lato e li divide equamente nelle 3 uscite. PuÃ² anche immagazzinare una piccola quantitÃ  di liquido.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Immagazzina una grande quantitÃ  di liquido. Emette il liquido che contiene da tutti i lati, simile ad un distributore di liquidi.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Funge da ponte tra due condotti che si incrociano.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Trasporta i liquidi sopra blocchi e strutture.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Trasporta i liquidi sopra blocchi e strutture istantaneamente. Ha un raggio piÃ¹ ampio rispetto al condotto sopraelevato, ma ha bisogno di energia per funzionare.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node.description: Trasmette l'energia ai nodi connessi. Il nodo riceve e trasmette l'energia a tutti i blocchi adiacenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Un nodo energetico avanzato con un raggio maggiore.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-tower.description: Un nodo energetico a lungo raggio ma con poche connessioni disponibili.
bundle_it.properties.block.diode.description: Dirige l'energia delle batterie in una direzione solo se dal lato opposto l'energia immagazzinata Ã¨ minore.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery.description: Immagazzina l'energia quando in eccesso. Emette l'energia nei momenti di deficit.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery-large.description: Immagazzina l'energia quando in eccesso. Emette l'energia nei momenti di deficit. Ha una capacitÃ  maggiore rispetto le batterie tradizionali.
bundle_it.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Genera energia bruciando combustibili come il carbone.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Genera energia se posizionato su luoghi caldi.
bundle_it.properties.block.steam-generator.description: Genera energia bruciando combustibili per trasformare l'acqua in vapore.
bundle_it.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Genera grandi quantitÃ  di energia sfruttando la differenza di temperatura tra criofluido e pirite ardente.
bundle_it.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Sfrutta lentamente il calore dei composti radioattivi in decadimento per produrre energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Genera piccole quantitÃ  di energia dal sole.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Genera piccole quantitÃ  di energia dal sole. PiÃ¹ efficente del pannello solare tradizionale.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Genera grandi quantitÃ  di energia dal torio. Ha bisogno di essere costantemente raffreddato. Esplode violentemente quando il liquido refrigerante non Ã¨ sufficente a raffreddarlo.
bundle_it.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Quando alla massima efficienza, genera enormi quantitÃ  di energia. Ha bisogno di una discreta quantitÃ  di energia per avviare il processo.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Quando posizionata su un minerale, estrae minerali ad un ritmo lento ma costante. PuÃ² scavare solo i minerali piÃ¹ teneri.
bundle_it.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Una trivella migliorata capace di estrarre il titanio. Lavora piÃ¹ velocemente di una trivella meccanica.
bundle_it.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Grazie alla tecnologia laser, permette di scavare ancora piÃ¹ velocemente ma deve essere alimentata. Ã in grado di estrarre il torio.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-drill.description: La trivella migliore. Richiede grandi quantitÃ  di energia per funzionare.
bundle_it.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Estrae l'acqua dal terreno. Utilizzato nei luoghi senza una fonte d'acqua superficiale nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.description: Coltiva delle piccole concentrazioni di spore presenti nell'atmosfera in baccelli di spore.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.details: Tecnologia recuperata. Usata per la produzione di enormi quantitÃ  di materiale organico il piÃ¹ efficientemente possibile. Ã probabile che sia il primo incubatore delle spore che ora ricoprono Serpulo.
bundle_it.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Utilizza grandi quantitÃ  di energia, sabbia ed acqua per estrarre il petrolio.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-shard.description: Nucleo della base. Una volta distrutto, il settore Ã¨ perso.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-shard.details: La prima generazione. Compatto. Autoreplicante. Dotato di propulsori di lancio monouso. Non pensato per viaggi interplanetari.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-foundation.description: Nucleo della base. Corazzato. Immagazzina piÃ¹ risorse del Frammento.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: Nucleo della base. Estremamente resistente. Immagazzina enormi quantitÃ  di risorse.
bundle_it.properties.block.vault.description: Immagazzina grandi quantitÃ  di oggetti di ogni tipo. PuÃ² essere svuotato con uno scaricatore.
bundle_it.properties.block.container.description: Imagazzina piccole quantitÃ  di oggetti di ogni tipo. PuÃ² essere svuotato con uno scaricatore.
bundle_it.properties.block.unloader.description: Scarica l'oggetto selezionato dai blocchi adiacenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Lancia lotti di oggetti ai settori selezionati.
bundle_it.properties.block.scatter.description: Spara agglomerati di piombo, rottami o vetro metallico ai nemici aerei.
bundle_it.properties.block.scorch.description: Incenerisce qualsiasi unitÃ  terrena nelle vicinanze. Altamente efficace a distanza ravvicinata.
bundle_it.properties.block.hail.description: Spara piccole schegge alle unitÃ  terrene su lunghe distanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.wave.description: Spara liquidi ai nemici. Quando alimentato ad acqua, estingue automaticamente gli incendi.
bundle_it.properties.block.lancer.description: Carica e spara potenti raggi di energia alle unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc.description: Spara archi elettrici alle unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.block.salvo.description: Spara raffiche di proiettili ai nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.fuse.description: Colpisce i nemici vicini con tre scariche penetranti.
bundle_it.properties.block.ripple.description: Spara molteplici proiettili alle unitÃ  terrene, anche su lunghe distanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.cyclone.description: Spara raffiche di proiettili ai nemici nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.spectre.description: Spara raffiche di proiettili perforanti alle unitÃ  aeree e terrene.
bundle_it.properties.block.meltdown.description: Carica e spara un potentissimo raggio laser ai nemici vicini. Richiede liquido refrigerante per funzionare.
bundle_it.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Spara con precisione un potente raggio, anche su grandi distanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.repair-point.description: Ripara costantemente l'unitÃ  piÃ¹ vicina nel suo raggio d'azione.
bundle_it.properties.block.segment.description: Indebolisce e distrugge i proiettili nel suo raggio d'azione. I laser non vengono mirati.
bundle_it.properties.block.parallax.description: Spara un raggio traente che avvicina i bersagli aerei, indebolendoli allo stesso tempo.
bundle_it.properties.block.tsunami.description: Spara potenti getti di liquidi ai nemici. Quando alimentato ad acqua, estingue automaticamente gli incendi.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Produce il silicio da sabbia e carbone usando la pirite come fonte di calore aggiuntiva. Aumenta la sua efficienza su terreni caldi.
bundle_it.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separa le scorie in diversi minerali, tra cui il torio.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Aumenta la velocitÃ  delle strutture vicine. Richiede tessuto di fase e silicio per funzionare.
bundle_it.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Trasporta carichi pesanti come le unitÃ  prodotte nelle fabbriche.
bundle_it.properties.block.payload-router.description: Divide equamente il carico dei trasportatori di massa in 3 direzioni.
bundle_it.properties.block.command-center.description: Permette di controllare il comportamento delle unitÃ  con diversi comandi.
bundle_it.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produce le unitÃ  terrene. Le unitÃ  prodotte possono essere utilizzate direttamente o trasferite nei ricostruttori per essere potenziate.
bundle_it.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produce le unitÃ  aeree. Le unitÃ  prodotte possono essere utilizzate direttamente o trasferite nei ricostruttori per essere potenziate.
bundle_it.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produce le unitÃ  navali. Le unitÃ  prodotte possono essere utilizzate direttamente o trasferite nei ricostruttori per essere potenziate.
bundle_it.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Migliora le unitÃ  in ingresso ad unitÃ  di seconda generazione.
bundle_it.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Migliora le unitÃ  in ingresso ad unitÃ  di terza generazione.
bundle_it.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Migliora le unitÃ  in ingresso ad unitÃ  di quarta generazione.
bundle_it.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Migliora le unitÃ  in ingresso ad unitÃ  di quinta generazione.
bundle_it.properties.block.switch.description: Un semplice interruttore. Il suo stato puÃ² essere letto e controllato dai processori.
bundle_it.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Esegue costantemente una sequenza di istruzioni. PuÃ² essere usato per controllare unitÃ  e strutture.
bundle_it.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Esegue costantemente una sequenza di istruzioni. PuÃ² essere usato per controllare unitÃ  e strutture. PiÃ¹ veloce del micro processore.
bundle_it.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Esegue costantemente una sequenza di istruzioni. PuÃ² essere usato per controllare unitÃ  e strutture. PiÃ¹ veloce del processore logico.
bundle_it.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Imagazzina le informazioni elaborate dai processori.
bundle_it.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Imagazzina le informazioni elaborate dai processori. Alta capacitÃ .
bundle_it.properties.block.logic-display.description: Visualizza la grafica arbitraria  elaborata dal processore.
bundle_it.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Visualizza la grafica arbitraria elaborata dal processore.
bundle_it.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: Una massiccia torre che utilizza potenti campi elettromagnetici. Accelera nuclei fino alla velocitÃ  di fuga per un impiego interplanetario.
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.description: Spara proiettili standard ai nemici vicini.
bundle_it.properties.unit.mace.description: Spara raffiche infuocate ai nemici vicini.
bundle_it.properties.unit.fortress.description: Spara proiettili con l'artiglieria a lungo raggio alle unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.unit.scepter.description: Spara una raffica di proiettili Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_it.properties.unit.reign.description: Spara una serie di proiettili perforanti a tutti i nemici nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.unit.nova.description: Spara raggi laser che danneggiano i nemici e riparano le strutture degli alleati. Ã in grado di volare.
bundle_it.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Spara archi elettrici che danneggiano i nemici e riparano le strutture degli alleati. Ã in grado di volare.
bundle_it.properties.unit.quasar.description: Spara raggi laser perforanti che danneggiano i nemici e riparano le strutture degli alleati. Ã in grado di volare. Corazzato.
bundle_it.properties.unit.vela.description: Spara un enorme e costante raggio laser che danneggia i nemici e ripara le strutture degli alleati. Ã in grado di volare.
bundle_it.properties.unit.corvus.description: Spara un enorme raggio laser esplosivo che danneggia i nemici e ripara le strutture degli alleati. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.crawler.description: Corre verso i nemici ed esplode, causando una grande esplosione. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.atrax.description: Spara sfere debilitanti di scorie alle unitÃ  terrene. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Spara raggi laser ai nemici, riparando se stesso. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Spara enormi raggi laser ai nemici, riparando se stesso. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Spara archi elettrici e laser perforanti ai nemici. PuÃ² camminare sopra la maggior parte dei terreni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.flare.description: Spara proiettili standard alle unitÃ  terrene e alle strutture nemiche.
bundle_it.properties.unit.horizon.description: Rilascia bombe alle unitÃ  terrene e alle strutture nemiche.
bundle_it.properties.unit.zenith.description: Spara salve di missili ai nemici vicini.
bundle_it.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Spara una raggica di proiettili ai nemici nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Spara due laser perforanti e schegge ai nemici nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.unit.mono.description: Estrae rame e piombo automaticamente per poi depositarlo nel nucleo.
bundle_it.properties.unit.poly.description: Ricostruisce automaticamente le strutture danneggiate e assiste altre unitÃ  durante la costruzione.
bundle_it.properties.unit.mega.description: Ripara automaticamente le strutture danneggiate. Ã in grado di trasportare blocchi e piccole unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.unit.quad.description: Rilascia grandi bombe alle unitÃ  terrene, riparando le strutture alleate e danneggiando quelle nemiche. Ã in grado di trasportare unitÃ  terrene di medie dimensioni.
bundle_it.properties.unit.oct.description: Protegge gli alleati nelle vicinanze con lo scudo rigenerante integrato. Ã in grado di trasportare la maggior parte delle unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.unit.risso.description: Spara una raffica di missili e proiettili ai nemici nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.unit.minke.description: Spara proiettili incendiari e standard alle unitÃ  terrene.
bundle_it.properties.unit.bryde.description: Spara proiettili e missili a lungo raggio ai nemici.
bundle_it.properties.unit.sei.description: Spara raffiche di missili e proiettili corazzati e perforanti ai nemici.
bundle_it.properties.unit.omura.description: Utilizza un bullone sparatato grazie a due binari a scorrimento accelerati da un campo elettromagnetico. Lunga gittata e perforazione estrema. Costruisce unitÃ  flare.
bundle_it.properties.unit.alpha.description: Difende il nucleo Frammento dai nemici. Costruisce strutture.
bundle_it.properties.unit.beta.description: Difende il nucleo Fondamento dai nemici. Costruisce strutture.
bundle_it.properties.unit.gamma.description: Difende il nucleo Kernel dai nemici. Costruisce strutture.

bundle_ja.properties.sector.biomassFacility.name: Biomass Synthesis Facility
bundle_ja.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.name: Windswept Islands
bundle_ja.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.name: Extraction Outpost
bundle_ja.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.name: Planetary Launch Terminal
bundle_ja.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
The origin of spores. This is the facility in which they were researched and initially produced.
Research the technology contained within. Cultivate spores for the production of fuel and plastics.

[lightgray]Upon this facility's demise, the spores were released. Nothing in the local ecosystem could compete with such an invasive organism.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Further past the shoreline is this remote chain of islands. Records show they once had [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.\n\nFend off the enemy's naval units. Establish a base on the islands. Research these factories.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: A remote outpost, constructed by the enemy for the purpose of launching resources to other sectors.\n\nCross-sector transport technology is essential for further conquest. Destroy the base. Research their Launch Pads.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Here lie remnants of the interstellar transport vessel that first entered this system.\n\nSalvage as much as possible from the wreckage. Research any intact technology.
bundle_ja.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
The final target.

This coastal base contains a structure capable of launching Cores to local planets. It is extremely well guarded.

Produce naval units. Eliminate the enemy as quickly as possible. Research the launch structure.

bundle_ja.properties.hint.mine: Move near the \uf8c4 copper ore and [accent]tap[] it to mine manually.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.depositItems: To transfer items, drag from your ship to the core.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle_ja.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle_ja.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e[accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a  [accent]Conveyor[] from the  [accent]Distribution[] tab.

Click and drag to place multiple conveyors.
[accent]Scroll[] to rotate.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] from the \ue814 [accent]Distribution[] tab.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to place multiple conveyors.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Place  [accent]Turrets[] to defend your base from enemies.

Turrets require ammo - in this case, copper.
Use conveyors and drills to supply them.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: Activate the \ue817 [accent]hammer[] in the bottom right and tap to break blocks.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to break in a selection.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.research: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button to research new technology.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.research.mobile: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[] to research new technology.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.unitControl: Hold [accent][[L-ctrl][] and [accent]click[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][Double-tap[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.launch: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the bottom right.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle_ja.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Hold [accent][[F][] and drag to select blocks to copy and paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] to copy a single block type.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Enable \ue844 [accent]diagonal mode[] and drag conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.boost: Hold [accent][[L-Shift][] to fly over obstacles with your current unit.\n\nOnly a few ground units have boosters.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.command: Press [accent][[G][] to command nearby units of [accent]similar type[] into formation.\n\nTo command ground units, you must first control another ground unit.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] your unit to command nearby units into formation.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Press [accent][[[] to pick up small blocks or units.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] a small block or unit to pick it up.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle_ja.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a ï¡¨ [accent]Foundation[] core over the ï¡© [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle_ja.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle_ja.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle_ja.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle_ja.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle_ja.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle_ja.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle_ja.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spores. Likely a synthetic life form. Emit gases toxic to other biological life. Extremely invasive. Highly flammable in certain conditions.
bundle_ja.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle_ja.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle_ja.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_ja.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.

bundle_lt.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_lt.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

De [accent]host[] knop hosts `een server op port [scarlet]6567[].

bundle_nl.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_nl.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin met het[accent] mijnen van koper[]. Klik op een vakje met koper om het te mijnen.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Sleep over het scherm om te bewegen.
[accent]Knijp met 2 vingers [] om in en uit te zoomen.
Begin met het[accent] mijnen van koper[]. Beweeg dichterbij, en klik er dan op.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill: Met de hand mijnen is inefficient.\n[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch voor je mijnen.\nPlaats een boor op koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Met de hand mijnen is inefficient.
[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch voor je mijnen.
Zoek de boren rechts onderin.
Selecter de[accent] mechanische boor[].
Plaats het op de koper door erop te klikken, druk dan op het[accent] vinkje[] om het bouwen te bevestigen.
Klik op de[accent] X knop[] om het te anuleren.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Elk blok heeft andere statistieken. Elke boor kan enkel bepaalde dingen mijnen.
Om het van een blok te checken,[accent] druk op de "?" knop terwijl je het blok vast hebt.[]

[accent]Lees de statatistieken van de Mechanische Boor maar eens.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core/basis te krijgen.\nLeg een lijn aan van je boren tot aan je core/basis.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core/basis te krijgen.
Leg een lijn aan van je boren tot aan je core/basis.
[accent] Doe dit door je vinger een paar seconden stil te houden[] en dan in een richting te slepen.

[accent]{0}/{1} Lopende banden worden in 1x geplaatst
[accent]0/1 items afgeleverd
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensieve gebouwen moeten worden gebouwd tegen de[lightgray] vijand[].\nBouw een duo kannon bij je basis.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo's hebben[accent] koperen ammunitie []nodig om te schieten.\nPlaats een drill ernaast om het van koper te voorzien.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause:
Tijdens een gevecht is het mogelijk[accent] het spel te pauzeren.[]
Je kan nog wel je gebouwen plannen.

[accent]Pauzeer het spel (spatie) nu.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]Houd rechts-klik ingedrukt[] om alle geselecteerde blokken te vernietigen.[]

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]klik op de hamer voor vernietigigs-mode[], klik dan op een blok om het te breken.
Vernietig een heel gebied door je vinger een paar seconden still te houden en dan te slepen in een richting.
Klik dan op het vinkje om het te bevestigen.

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In sommige situaties, is het nodig om items uit een blok te kunnen pakken.
Om dit te doen, [accent]klik je op een blok[] waar items in zitten, en dan [accent]op het item te klikken[] in het zwarte menu.
Meerdere items tegelijk kan je eruit halen door [accent]het ingedrukt te houden[].

[accent]Pak wat koper uit de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.deposit: Je kan de items weer terugstoppen door van je schip het terug te slepen naar waar je het wilt.\n\n[accent]Stop het nu weer terug in de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves: De[lightgray] vijand[] naderd.\n\nVerdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Bouw meer verdedigingen.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
De[lightgray] vijand[] naderd.

Verdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Je schip schiet automatisch op vijanden.
Bouw meer verdedigingen, en mine meer koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.launch:
Tijdens sommige waves, kan je je core[accent] lanceren[], hiermee verlaat je de basis permanent[accent] maar je neemt wel alles dat in de core zit met je mee.[]
Met deze grondstoffen kan je nieuwe technologieÃ«n onderzoeken.

[accent]Druk op de lanceerknop.
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: Een nuttig materiaal voor gebouwen. Wordt erg vaak in blokken gebruikt.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: Een basismateriaal. Wordt veel gebruikt in elektronica en vloeistoftransport.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: Een supersterke glas-samenstelling. Veel gebruikt voor vloeistof transport en opslag.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.description: Gemineraliseerde koolstof, gebruikt voor ammunitie en elektrische isolatie.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.steam-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Genereert veel meer zonne-energie dan een normale zonnepaneel, maar is ook veel duurder om te bouwen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Genereert super veel elektriciteit van radioactief thorium. Moet constant gekoeld worden. Als het oververhit raakt explodeert het met een grote knal. Genereert meer energie naarmate het voller zit, met normale productie op halve capaciteit.
bundle_nl.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

Ook de [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [lightgray]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
